revised_title: Amplification and Analysis of Fossil DNA from Miocene Plant Specimens
tldr: This article discusses the extraction and analysis of DNA from Miocene plant fossils, focusing on a 770 base pair sequence from a Magnolia latahensis leaf. The successful amplification of this ancient DNA indicates that the age of recoverable and sequenced DNA may be significantly extended, opening up new possibilities for the field of molecular palaeontology.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Molecular Biology
